title: RegExRX 1.8 [K]
description:
Link for more info: http://www.mactechnologies.com/index.php?page=downloads#regexrx
Includes: [Serial]

RegExRX is a regular expression editor with many features designed to help in the development and storage of regular expressions. Based on the PCRE library, RegExRX will allow a user to craft patterns that are compatible with most regular expression flavors and will let them easily copy those patterns to and from other languages like Perl, Ruby, PHP, JavaScript, AppleScript, 4D, and Xojo.

What's New
Version 1.8:

Rewrote engine around RegExMBS.
Cocoa app, ready for Retina display.
Added support for unicode tokens (p{}, P{}, and X).
Added items to Search Pattern Insert menu for Unicode Scripts & Properties.
Added Templates menu.
Added "Save To Templates" menu item under File menu.
Changed "Download Samples" to ask if the Samples should be stored in the Templates folder.
Made interface more responsive during long matches.
Added search and replace timings.
Added Copy As RegExMBS Code menu.
Added French version of Copy As 4D Code.
Corrected colorization of curly braces when they do not form a proper repeating structure. E.g., "{3,}" will be colorized but "{ 3,}", "{ 3}", etc., won't.
Added tokens to Insert menu.
Added position and pattern segment to error message with a bad search pattern.
Added Recursion Limit preference.
Added Backtracking Limit preference.
Added preferences for font and size in patterns and text.
Added preferences to change text match colors.
Changed Mac version to use background highlighting instead of underline to show matches and highlight matching brackets.
Implemented Redo.
Added "Escape Dot" and "Escape Brackets" to Paste Special.
Character Chart will show the first character of text dropped onto it.
Limited width of Character Chart.
Bracket matching highlighting will appear for a second instead of 0.75 seconds.
Menus will update live when the option key is pressed/released.
Registration reminder will come up every 15 minutes instead of 10.

Requirements
Intel, OS X 10.6.6 or later
